room_title: Escape room "Escape the Wild West" by Ideal Escape Rooms in Detroit
room_description: You’re a gang of disorderly outlaws, and you’ve all been caught by the Sheriff. He’s keeping you in the town jail until your transfer to federal prison. The Jailer is sleeping, and that’s your chance to escape! Find the evidence used against you, and escape the Sheriff’s office to be free! But hurry, you only have 60 minutes.
